Perceptor:

Perceptor nodded, he was pleaced and said "well, rules here are easy 
and clear... a good job is rewarded but and troubles, 
punished...Welcome to BlackFortress"said Perceptor while he pressed a 
button and a sort of layer moved showing a black surface"Put one of 
your hands in the surface" said Perceptor "that surface will take 
your signal signature, in that way that internal defence won't hurt 
you"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Ender::
>     "As I said I have no faction.  I believe I was born into one 
but I was 
> abandoned only moments afterward.  So I have no prior allegiances.  
I am 
> ruthless and cunning but I serve well.  I'm not so good at leading 
troops.  
> It takes a different set of skills."
